Title: Relates to the creation of the "Kids Deserve Justice" license plate and the "kids deserve justice fund"
Summary: Relates to the creation of the "Kids Deserve Justice" license plate and the "kids deserve justice fund".

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the creation of a "Kids Deserve Justice" license plate; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to creating the "kids deserve justice fund"
